short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share content from websites with anyone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser enhancement makes it effortless to send snippets of anything in your browser to others.  For example:

* Send grabs from YouTube, TikTok, Twitch
* Send products from Amazon or Shopify
* Send listings from Airbnb, Redfin or Trulia
* Send a post from Facebook, Linkedin, Instagram, Reddit
* Send your favorite Netflix, DisneyPlus, HBO Go show
* Send crypto or stock info from Coinbase, Yahoo / Google Finance
* Send images from internal tools used at your company

This is a privacy oriented browser extension.  No account is required to use the extension, no personal data is collected.  See our privacy policy for more details.
